Text:
ABSOLUTELY works....you just have to do a little digging:

First, you need HDTVPump:

http://www.dvbportal.de/projects/hdtvpump/

And then (At least for any HD-DVD releases by HDTV_CHINA i have) you need Matroska Splitter

http://haali.cs.msu.ru/mkv/

You will also need to have a MPEG2 decoder previously installed. NVIDIA's works. If you can play a DVD - chances are you have a valid decoder.


Install those and report back!

KMPlayer to play HD from HDTV CHINA
http://kmplayer.kde.org/download.php

If you download those 3 and install them all downloads from HDTV CHINA will work Have downloaded 40 and all works

Hurrafor 
How to install kmplayer. only source code.

in swe. Hur installerar jag en source code

after install hdtvpump/matroskasplitter.

i play with mpc it works

i dont now how  but it works great now.

what is this?

tv for free?

WTF... This definitely doesn't look like HDDVD... Is this mislabelled? First of all, the picture is extremely grainy, second of all this is 16:9 aspect ratio, the film is 2.35:1. So this has been cropped. I don't think they'd do that on an HDDVD?
I wonder where is the Seed .........!?!
And the fact that the picture is rash, that's OK......?

to play:
good enough comp
uninstall all crap codecs
install cccp

however, i'm very much questioning the quality of this...
the bottom ~8 pixel rows are distorted and frequently show artifacts
picture is oversharpened
framerate is 30, not 24
stream info says interlaced (though i don't notice any line artifacts)

the opening scenes are also supposed to be insultingly inaccurate
So many of us stuck at 99.2% Please seed. Thanks.
